org.apache.flume.sink

Class AbstractSingleSinkProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flume.sink.AbstractSingleSinkProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurable, LifecycleAware, SinkProcessor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultSinkProcessor

    public abstract class AbstractSingleSinkProcessor
extends Object
implements SinkProcessor
    A Sink Processor that only accesses a single Sink.
